TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EventSetter extends System.Windows.SetterBase

summary.span: 以某种样式表示事件资源库。

span.span: Represents an event setter in a style.

summary.span: 事件资源库可调用指定的事件处理程序来响应事件。

span.span: Event setters invoke the specified event handlers in response to events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件资源库可调用以响应路由事件，将应用于引用的所有元素指定的事件处理程序而不是无需将实例处理程序附加到每个元素。Event setters invoke the specified event handlers in response to routed events, which apply to all elements that reference the rather than requiring you to attach instance handlers to each individual element. 仅支持对象。Only support objects. 您可以仅声明也是路由的事件的事件的事件资源库。You can only declare event setters for events that are routed events. 浮升事件，或隧道事件，您可以声明为具有直接的路由策略，路由事件的事件资源库。You can declare event setters for routed events with a direct routing strategy, bubbling events, or tunneling events. 实例通常通过创建类[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]，如对象元素在样式中的定义通过[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。Instances of the class are usually created through [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], as an object element within a style defined through [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. 还可能会从代码实例化。An might also be instantiated from code. 事件资源库不能使用在主题资源字典中包含的样式。Event setters cannot be used in a style that is contained in a theme resource dictionary. 这是因为在运行时主题资源字典通常是松散[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_baml](~/includes/tlasharptla-baml-md.md)]文件，并且没有任何作用域定义伴随定义处理程序的代码隐藏可以存在。This is because a theme resource dictionary at run time is often loose [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_baml](~/includes/tlasharptla-baml-md.md)] files, and does not have any scope defined where accompanying code-behind that defines the handlers can exist. 附加事件资源库通过处理程序后面的情况下，任何类处理程序和任何实例处理程序之后调用。Handlers attached through event setters are invoked after any class handlers for an event, and also after any instance handlers. 因此，如果类处理程序或实例处理程序将标记事件在其自变量中进行处理，然后声明事件资源库的处理程序未调用，除非专门将事件 setter `true`。As a result, if a class handler or instance handler marks an event handled in its arguments, then the handler declared by an event setter is not invoked, unless the event setter specifically sets `true`. 事件资源库还可能来自样式。Event setters may also come from styles. 事件 setter 处理程序为指定的样式从后立即样式的处理程序将调用。The event setter handlers from the style specified as will be invoked after the handlers on the immediate style. 请注意，只能支持对象。Note that only supports objects. 触发器 (和派生类) 不支持。Triggers ( and derived classes) do not support . ## Examples 下面的示例建立一个页级样式中。The following example establishes a single within a page-level style. [!code-xaml[EventOvwSupport#XAML2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/EventOvwSupport/CSharp/page2.xaml#xaml2)] 下面的示例事件处理程序：The following shows the example event handlers: [!code-csharp[EventOvwSupport#EventSetterRef](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/EventOvwSupport/CSharp/page2.xaml.cs#eventsetterref)] [!code-vb[EventOvwSupport#EventSetterRef](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/EventOvwSupport/visualbasic/page2.xaml.vb#eventsetterref)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果通常使用该签名您创建在代码中，或在代码隐藏中来创建，增加现有的样式之前，若要使用的内容。This signature is typically used if you creating an in code, or in code-behind to create an that augments an existing style prior to use.

summary.span: 获取或设置此 响应的特定路由事件。

span.span: Gets or sets the particular routed event that this responds to.

value.span: 路由事件的标识符字段。

span.span: The identifier field of the routed event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能设置此属性一次样式包含正在使用中，因此被密封。You cannot set this property once the style containing the is in use and thus is sealed. 如果在代码中设置此属性，则样式是否正在使用可能会检查的值上的属性实例，然后尝试设置才能。If you set this property in code and there is the possibility that the style is in use, check the value of the property on the instance before you attempt to set . ## Examples 下面的示例设置属性的一部分中的标记样式。The following example sets the property as part of an in a markup style. [!code-xaml[EventOvwSupport#XAML2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/EventOvwSupport/CSharp/page2.xaml#xaml2)]

exception.span: 尝试对密封 设置此属性。

span.span: Attempted to set this property on a sealed .

member this.HandledEventsToo : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值确定是否仍然应调用分配给资源库的处理程序，即使事件在其事件数据中被标记为已处理。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines whether the handler assigned to the setter should still be invoked, even if the event is marked handled in its event data.

value.span: 如果仍然应调用处理程序，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the handler should still be invoked; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 设置特征将如何调用某一事件的处理程序必须始终执行在代码中，与保持一致的一般原则，没有方法来指定时分配定义的事件处理程序实例直接到名为中的事件[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]特性语法。Setting the characteristics of how an event's handlers will be invoked must always be performed in code, in keeping with the general principle that there is no way to specify when assigning defined event handlers for instances directly to named events in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] attribute syntax. 尽管在中设置此值[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]不会生成任何编译时错误，从而[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]时使用了该样式将产生运行时异常。Although setting this value in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] does not generate any compile-time errors, the resulting [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] will produce a run-time exception when the style is used. ## XAML 文本使用情况XAML Text Usage 此属性不应在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。This property should not be used in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. 请参阅“备注”。See Remarks.

member this.Handler : Delegate with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置对资源库中路由事件的处理程序的引用。

span.span: Gets or sets the reference to a handler for a routed event in the setter.

value.span: 对此 所附加处理程序的引用。

span.span: Reference to the handler that is attached by this .
